meta.unitPolicy: All comparisons rendered as billions of selected base currency.
notes: M2 primary source: World Bank broad money (FM.LBL.BMNY.CN).
Gap-filling source: OECD monetary aggregates (M3=MABM; fallback M1=MANM), annual XDC.
DE/FR/IT gap fill: EA19 aggregate allocated by country GDP share within EMU, then globally calibrated.
Residual gaps are filled via WB growth-chain and interpolation.
FX conversion uses yfinance annual average close where available; World Bank PA.NUS.FCRF fallback otherwise.
Cross-country comparability is indicative because national aggregate definitions differ.

events.title: Plaza Accord
events.detail: G5 agreement to depreciate the USD; major FX regime shift.

events.title: USSR Dissolution
events.detail: Large geopolitical realignment and transition shocks.

events.title: Asian Financial Crisis
events.detail: Regional FX collapses, reserve loss, and liquidity stress.

events.title: Euro Launch
events.detail: Introduction of EUR and structural shift in European monetary transmission.

events.title: China WTO Entry
events.detail: Trade integration accelerates growth and credit deepening.

events.title: Global Financial Crisis
events.detail: Aggressive monetary easing, liquidity facilities, and balance sheet expansion.

events.title: Euro Sovereign Debt Crisis
events.detail: Fragmentation risk and unconventional policy in euro area.

events.title: Brexit Referendum
events.detail: Sterling repricing and UK macro-financial uncertainty spike.

events.title: COVID-19 Policy Shock
events.detail: Historic fiscal-monetary response and sharp jump in broad money growth.

events.title: Russia-Ukraine War
events.detail: Energy shock, inflation surge, and synchronized rate hikes.

sources.name: World Bank - Official Exchange Rate (LCU per USD)
